bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, which do not ache or itch and cannot be cured for an extended period of time. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 35: 冷氣入於瘡，令血澀不行，其瘡則頑， 令不知痛癢，亦經久難瘥，名為冷瘡 , “When cold qi enters the sores, the cold blood cannot move freely. As a result the sores become stubborn. They neither ache nor itch, and are incurable for a long time. They are called cold sores ”.
